Package com.jidesoft.document

The package contains the classes related to DocumentPane component for JIDE Components product.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CloneableDocumentComponent If a DocumentComponent implements this interface, we will display "Split Vertically" and "Split Horizontally" on the popup menu when right clicking on the tab.
DocumentComponentFactory A factory to create document component automatically.
DocumentComponentListener The listener interface for receiving document pane events.
DocumentPane.TabbedPaneCustomizer A tabbed pane customizer that can customize the JideTabbedPanes used by DocumentPane.
IDocumentGroup An interface to represent the concept of document group.
IDocumentPane Interface of any document interface.
PopupMenuCustomizer Interface to customer a popup menu in any IDocumentPane.
Product  
 

Class Summary
DefaultStringConverter Convert from one string to another string.
DocumentComponent A class that represents a document object.
DocumentComponentAdapter Adapter class for DocumentComponentListener.
DocumentComponentEvent Event for DocumentComponent.
DocumentPane The main class for tabbed-document interface.
DocumentPanePersistenceUtils  
FloatingDocumentContainer The container for the DocumentComponent when floating.
TdiGroup A DocumentGroup implementation for Tabbed-Document Interface.
 

Package com.jidesoft.document Description

The package contains the classes related to DocumentPane component for JIDE Components product.
